snippet.title: Skyrim: Bards College Expansion - Trailer
snippet.description:
Trailer for the Bards College Expansion in Skyrim.

Available now on PC and Xbox! https://tinyurl.com/BardsCollegeExpansion

Play music, challenge your peers to insult duels, sway the hearts and minds of the people, and learn that no one in the nine holds can sing like a Bard can—or Shout. This all-new Skyrim expansion boasts epic quests, dungeons, mini-games, abilities, a new skill system, weapons, clothing, and more!

For more information https://kinggathcreations.com/bards-college-expansion/

-----------------------------------
Capture and Editing: Pontus Johansson
https://twitter.com/_pontusjoh
-----------------------------------
Sound Design: Jason Dotts
https://www.instagram.com/baddad.tv/
-----------------------------------
Music: Glory and Honor by Serj Anto
Licensed through PremiumBeat.com
-----------------------------------
Voiceover: Ryan Cooper 
https://ryjoco.co.uk/
-----------------------------------
